item.firesenderexpansion.void_staff_hold: Capable of harnessing a Black Hole
item.firesenderexpansion.endchiridion.de: A spellbook for those seeking the highest level of heroism.
item.firesenderexpansion.core_of_ender.d: Flares up with unstable energy when you cast a spell
item.firesenderexpansion.ender_treasury_: Grants access to the infinite armaments of the End
Protects from most forms of magical teleportation
item.firesenderexpansion.infused_obsidia: Obtained by slamming obsidian rods into ancient debris
spell.firesenderexpansion.partial_telepo: Selectively teleport a part of a person's body. Deals more damage the less mana they have.
death.attack.firesenderexpansion.partial: %1$s was bisected by %2$s's burst of ender energy
spell.firesenderexpansion.aspect_of_the_: Manifest a homing shulker bullet when you hit an entity with a magic attack.
spell.firesenderexpansion.displacement_c: Create a circle made of portals, teleporting any living thing that tries to leave it back inside
spell.firesenderexpansion.dimensional_ad: Use ancient Ender knowledge to survive against each dimension's perils.
msg.firesenderexpansion.dimensional_adap: This could be deciphered if you had an Endchiridion
Summon a large quantity of unstable swords and launch them at your enemies with devastating force
spell.firesenderexpansion.obsidian_rod.g: Fire a series of extradimensional obsidian rods at your opponent, grounding them in this reality and preventing them from teleporting.
spell.firesenderexpansion.hollow_crystal: Manifest an impossibility of Ender magic and send it outwards, moving through blocks and devastating anything in its path.
spell.firesenderexpansion.dragons_fury.g: Strike with the fury of the Ender Dragon, dealing wide but low damage and knocking things away.
spell.firesenderexpansion.binary_stars.g: Select 1-2 targets and shoot 2 homing stars. The first applies a debuff that is effective against mages and the second against melee. After passing through once, they will teleport above the target again and slam down, doing AoE damage.
death.attack.firesenderexpansion.binary_: %1$s was scattered among the stars by %2$s
Manifest a small vacuum in the world, drawing everyone nearby into an existence where all is void. The space will collapse shortly after existing, but while active you will also gain significant strength.
advancements.firesenderexpansion.obtain_: Harness the power of a black hole and place it onto a staff capable of warping space itself.
advancements.firesenderexpansion.wear_en: Wear the full End Lord armor set
advancements.firesenderexpansion.obtain_: Create an item that is currently too volatile to use for crafting, but may have other uses
msg.firesenderexpansion.cannot_adapt: You cannot adapt to this place
msg.firesenderexpansion.cannot_cast: You cannot cast this right now
msg.firesenderexpansion.fail_step: Scintillating Step cannot teleport across dimensions
